title: My account has been moved and gotten everything taken away.
body: So my account has been moved from EU to NA, used to be lvl 30 and have receipts from purchases made on the account with this Username. Now its on NA lvl 1 and nothing on it. What can you do to get this resolved?

replies.body: An account transfer, even if compromised, should not reset to level 1.  Are you sure you're logging into the correct username and region?  No worries, let us help you out!  Fill out an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help with recovery, updating info, and possible reparations caused by unauthorized access.  We'll get back to you there as soon as we can!
